name: Greyfur
description: The Greyfur is a small humanoid with membranes between its limbs, enabling it to glide gracefully. It possesses a staff for melee combat and can cast spells.
memorable: Its unique glide ability allows it to maneuver vertically and evade attacks effortlessly.
goals: To ambush foes and manipulate the battlefield using spells.
relations: May encounter lemurfolk or other spellcasting humanoids.
environment: Typically found in forested or elevated areas where it can utilize its glide ability.
strengths: High dexterity and intelligence make it agile and clever, adept at casting spells.
weaknesses: Lacks physical strength and is vulnerable in direct melee combat.
attacks: Wields a staff for close combat and can unleash an Arcane Bolt as a ranged attack.
most_powerful_ability: Can cast spells like Color Spray and Sleep for crowd control.
equipment: Carries a staff as a melee weapon.
senses: Has darkvision with a range of 60 feet.
skills: Skilled in Acrobatics and Stealth, enabling effective ambush tactics.
additional_information: Glide ability allows safe landings from heights.
Can manipulate objects from a distance using Mage Hand.
Spellcasting abilities enhance versatility in combat.
Potential for tactical advantages in vertical environments.
Utilizes updrafts to extend gliding movement.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like Light, Mage Hand, and Prestidigitation at will, along with Color Spray and Sleep three times a day.
test_queries: humanoid that casts spells and glides
creature skilled in stealth and acrobatics
